ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 36
ygData.msgSnippet: Well we knew it would be coming I haven t checked yet but if it is only on the test server this is my recommendation.  Pot till you drop because it will be
ygData.messageBody:
Well we knew it would be coming I haven't checked yet but if it is only on
the test server this is my recommendation. Pot till you drop because it
will be everywhere on Tuesday. The second thing is the mystical word
SPECULATION. You heard it right just like the big time investors do on TV.
When you get ready to log off for the last time before the patch fill your
inventory with those beautiful sketches that cost a little over a silver.
Since you can usually sell items back for about half of the store price and
the store price is now over a plat you should be able to sell each sketch
for about a 5G profit. Assume that you fill the bank and your personal
inventory with sketches. 8 bank slots 8 personal slots each with a
backpack. That is 128 available slots to fill with stacks of 20 sketches
for a total of 2560 sketches each with a 5G profit. Surprise, Surprise that
is over 1000P in one night with no effort on your part : ) Enjoy it. It
may be the last profit you will see with pottery.


>Message: 4
> Date: Sat, 24 Jul 1999 14:38:07 -0500
> From: Ascii <in@...>
>Subject: Re: Well tiime to get POed pottery buffs....
>
> What are you talking about? 1225c per sketch? Last night I made my
usual
>batch of pie tins and made the same 5 plat profit I usually make. Or are
you
>talking about the upcoming changes on the test server?
